thread.title: Fans think One Direction's teaser clip is absolutely Perfect
thread.title_full: Fans think One Direction's teaser clip is absolutely Perfect

title: Fans think One Direction's teaser clip is absolutely Perfect
text:
Fans think One Direction's teaser clip is absolutely Perfect Fans think One Direction's teaser clip is absolutely Perfect Share 
One Direction have released a sneak peek of their new single, Perfect – and fans are super excited. 
With the hashtag #WeArePerfect trending on Twitter before the single even drops, the boys are certainly looking forward to sharing the song. Looks like the cat's out of the bag!!! Our next single is Perfect. Can't wait for you all to hear it! 
— Louis Tomlinson (@Louis_Tomlinson) October 10, 2015 Our next single is called 'Perfect'. Looking forward to you hearing it, hope that you like those apples. 
— Harry Styles. (@Harry_Styles) October 9, 2015 
In fact, they’re so excited that they’ve released a 14-second snippet to tantalise 1D fans. 
The lyrics are: “If you like to do whatever you’ve been dreaming about / Baby you’re perfect / Baby you’re perfect / Let’s start right now.” 
Struggling to cope with the preview, fans were overwhelmed. When drag me down comes on and you've only just heard 14 seconds of perfect @onedirection WHY DO YOU HAVE TO DO THIS TO MY HEART 
— chrissy :) fb or unf (@cupcake_harryyx) October 14, 2015 And this is my reaction, this morning, in bed. Perfect is just.. Perfect. – @onedirection #Perfect pic.twitter.com/P7gmypTQJP
